Yes, many of the Welsh language schools in Cardiff offer adult classes and courses for people who are interested in learning or improving their Welsh language skills. Some of these classes are held in the evenings or weekends to accommodate adults who work or have other commitments during the day. Here are a few examples of Welsh language courses for adult learners available in Cardiff:

1. Cardiff and Vale College - Offers courses at different levels, from beginner to advanced, with flexible learning options. 2. Learn Welsh Cardiff - Provides courses in various locations around Cardiff, including online classes through Zoom. 3. Coleg y Cymoedd - Offers Welsh language courses for adult learners at different levels, from beginner to advanced, with both daytime and evening classes. 4. Cardiff University - Offers Welsh language courses to staff, students, and the general public who want to learn the Welsh language in a supportive learning environment. These courses are a great way to learn Welsh, and they provide opportunities to meet other people who share an interest in the Welsh language and culture.
